states.prompt: Let's find missing dimensions! A storage box has volume 144 cubic meters, length 8 m, and width 6 m. What's its height?
Use V = l Ã— w Ã— h. Substitute what you know: 144 = 8 Ã— 6 Ã— h. Calculate 8 Ã— 6 first.
Excellent! You can now find any missing dimension of a cuboid when you know the volume and other dimensions. This is very useful in real-world applications!
